tool.name: Analyse your files
tool.command: test -f /.dockerenv && echo "/.dockerenv present" || echo "/.dockerenv absent"; echo; echo "% pwd"; pwd; echo; echo "% ls -l ."; ls -l .; echo; echo "% ls -l .."; ls -l ..; echo; echo "% ls -l ../home"; ls -l ../home; echo; echo "% unzip..."; unzip $input1 -d input_dir; echo; echo "% uv run..."; uv run identify.py ./input_dir > results.txt
